widget.name: WinJS.UI.ItemContainer
widget.description: Defines an item that can be pressed, swiped, and dragged.

property.name: element
property.description: Gets the DOM element that hosts the itemContainer control.

property.name: draggable
property.description: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the item can be dragged. The default value is false.

property.name: selected
property.description: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the item is selected.

property.name: swipeOrientation
property.description: Gets or sets the swipe orientation of the ItemContainer control. The default value is "vertical".

property.name: tapBehavior
property.description: Gets or sets how the ItemContainer control reacts when the user taps or clicks an item. The tap or click can invoke the item, select it and invoke it, or have no effect. Possible values: "toggleSelect", "invokeOnly", and "none". The default value is "invokeOnly".

property.name: swipeBehavior
property.description: Gets or sets how the ItemContainer control reacts to the swipe interaction. The swipe gesture can select the item or it can have no effect on the current selection. Possible values: "select", "none". The default value is: "select".

property.name: selectionDisabled
property.description: Gets or sets whether the item selection is disabled. The default value is false.

part.name: itemcontainer
part.description: Main container for the selection item control.

part.name: selectionbackground
part.description: The background of a selection checkmark.

part.name: focusedoutline
part.description: Used to display an outline when the main container has keyboard focus.
